verbs.description: [ARG0: Chinese and U.S. envoys] [V: sparred] [ARGM-LOC: at the World Trade Organization] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG1: over U.S. President Donald Trump 's claims that China steals American ideas] .
Chinese and U.S. envoys sparred at the World Trade Organization on Monday over U.S. President Donald Trump 's claims that [ARG0: China] [V: steals] [ARG1: American ideas] .
